ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will prevent changing the storage location status once set.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF($UserRole.Name != 'Lab Manager', OR( AND( ISCHANGED(CT_Storage_Location__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(CT_Storage_Location__c))) ), AND( ISCHANGED(CB_Storage_Location__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(CB_Storage_Location__c))) ), AND( ISCHANGED(PT_20_Storage_Location__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(PT_20_Storage_Location__c))) ), AND( ISCHANGED(PT_Storage_Location__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(PT_Storage_Location__c))) ), AND( ISCHANGED(Exosome_Storage_Location__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Exosome_Storage_Location__c))) ) ),false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Storage Location of the sample once the value is set. If you wish to change this value please ask your Admin.
